text.p: English premier league Tottenham signed Sporting Lisbon's Portuguese international winger Jose Dominguez for 1.6 million pounds ($2.53 million) on Friday. But the move came too late for Dominguez to make his debut in Sunday's league opener against Manchester United.
Dominguez, only 1.6 metres tall, has played in England before, spending a season with Birmingham City two years ago. He appeared set to join Southampton before Spurs stepped in.
Dominguez is the London club's third major summer signing following the arrival of Newcastle pair Les Ferdinand and David Ginola last month.
